item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Ok, that is pretty amazing. I never cared much for that song, but the remix is bad ass. Thanks, ed.X!
item.content:encoded: Ok, that is pretty amazing. I never cared much for that song, but the remix is bad ass. Thanks, ed.X!

item.title: By: Ed

item.description:
Magnetic Fields remixes you say?
How about Fido, Your Leash Is Too Long (Coin Operated Boy remix?

Much love.
Ed.X
